model.fsa
Interface FSAState

All Superinterfaces:
DESElement
All Known Implementing Classes:
State
public interface FSAState
extends DESElement

The interface defining a representation of a state in a finite state automaton.

Author:
Helen Bretzke

Method Summary
 void addSourceTransition(FSATransition t)
          Adds a transition that originates from this state.

          Adds a transition that ends in this state.

          Returns an iterator for the transitions ending in this state.
 boolean isInitial()
          Returns true iff this is an initial state.
 boolean isMarked()
          Returns true iff this is a marked (final) state.
